thread.title: First Look at Matt Smith as Prince Philip on Set of Netflix's 'The Crown'
thread.title_full: First Look at Matt Smith as Prince Philip on Set of Netflix's 'The Crown'

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: First Look at Matt Smith as Prince Philip on Set of Netflix's 'The Crown'
text:
Comments The former 'Doctor Who' actor plays Philip Mountbatten, Duke of Edinburgh, on the upcoming royal drama. 
Matt Smith channels his inner royal. The former " Doctor Who " actor is seen transforming into Philip Mountbatten, Duke of Edinburgh, on the set of his new Netlix series " The Crown " at Southwark Cathedral in London. He was joined by John Lithgow who will play Winston Churchill. Based on Peter Morgan's play "The Audience" which starred Helen Mirren , the royal drama centers on Queen Elizabeth II and the prime ministers who shaped Britain's post-war destiny. Claire Foy is tapped to portray as the Queen. The series tells the inside story of two of the most famous addresses in the world - Buckingham Palace and 10 Downing Street - and the intrigues, love lives and machinations behind the great events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.
